name: Greenlight
body: ### Consent Management System This system is designed by BRC for managing consent forms in ORB (Oxford Radcliffe Biobank) ### Features * (#Uploading-scanned-forms-in-all-image-formats-and-PDF-format) * [Supporting multi-page PDF consent forms](#multipagePDF) * [Supporting several consent forms](#severalforms) * [Annotating uploaded consent forms](#annotate) * [Cut-Up room consent checker](#cutup) * [Supporting search on consent forms details](#search) [Uploading scanned forms in all image formats and PDF format](#Uploading-scanned-forms-in-all-image-formats-and-PDF-format) Most image files and pdf format are supported in this online system. Operators will scan and upload the consent forms. ![Alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SoheilSaif/greenlight.github.io/gh-pages/images/icon_download.png) #### Supporting multi-page PDF consent forms Scanning several consent forms as batch may result to a multi-page PDF file in which each consent form is saved in a page. In this case the file can be uploaded and 'Consent Management System' will save each page as a separate consent form. #### Supporting several consent form templates In ORB, several consent forms are used such as ORB General Consent Form, Oncology Consent Form for Adults and .... . In this case users can select the consent form type while annotating the scanned form. #### Annotating uploaded consent forms By annotating a consent form, an operator will enter all details os a consent form such as NHS number, MRN, consent date, consent take name,answers to each consent questions,... This process is facilitated by a number of fast entry buttons such as Answer 'Yes to all', Answer 'No to all',... In case of ambiguous or blank answers to a consent question, operators can easily select an item form the list and apply this option for a question. #### Cut-Up room consent checker #### Search facilities Searching for consent forms based on NHS Number, MRN, Consent date, Consent Taker name and ...
